thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Just happened upon the SmartBuyGlasses website and found a frame I had been looking at. Price was so much better so I took a chance, entered my prescription info and ordered it. Arrived at my house much sooner than I had expected, and the glasses are perfect. Prescription was perfect and the frames did not require any adjustment. I've been recommending SmartBuyGlasses to my co-workers, friends, and family!
